title: Twitter's Challenges Heat Up as Meta Prepares Rival App
description: The new threat comes as Elon Musk’s company offered further explanation for its controversial cap on how many tweets users can see.

title: What Is Spill? The Twitter Alternative Trending After Elon Musk Set User Limits
description: Designed by former Twitter employees, the app has attracted users including Questlove and garnered interest from Lizzo.

title: Facebook Faces Fresh Threat to Sending Personalized Ads in EU
description: The surprise ruling could short-circuit the platform’s legal efforts to protect its ad-based business model on the continent.

title: U.S. Looks to Restrict China's Access to Cloud Computing to Protect Advanced Technology
description: The Biden administration proposal, aimed at closing a loophole in chip export controls, could escalate a tit-for-tat fight with Beijing.
